articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Samsung could drop Google Gemini in favor of Perplexity for Galaxy S26 - Ars Technica
articles.description: This move would reduce Samsung’s reliance on Google.

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Destruction Showcased in New Leaked Video - Wccftech
articles.description: A new leaked video of Battlefield 6 shows off the awesome environmental destruction that DICE has worked on for the new game.
articles.content: Yet another Battlefield 6 video has been leaked on YouTube. It's a six-minute-long footage that primarily shows off the amazing destruction that players will see in the upcoming installment of the mi… [+1840 chars]
